channel.title: Client
channel.description:
How do i make the client so when you click play or run it opens the internet to the voting page for my server here is the run code and link please help. 32-bit [code]@echo off title Client v2 cd Paragon java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code] 64-bit
@echo off title Paragon Pkerz - 64 Bit Clients cd Gian "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/Jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
and the link
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?action=up&server=diviness.zapto.org

item.title: Client

item.description:

How do i make the client so when you click play or run it opens the internet to the voting page for my server here is the run code and link please help.
